info.author: Ales Smrcka
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
SimpleXML is a library for very simply manipulating XML files. It lets you
harvest data from XML files, change values of attributes, print or change data
of elements, create new elements, etc. All you need is to know the path to
element with definition of attributes and/or order of element. You get object
with attributes like name, attr, value, data etc.
info.name: simplexml
info.html_description: SimpleXML is a library for very simply manipulating XML files. It lets you harvest data from XML files, change values of attributes, print or change data of elements, create new elements, etc. All you need is to know the path to element with definition of attributes and/or order of element. You get object with attributes like name, attr, value, data etc.
